text: that you may believe li-tu’minū may also here be read li-yu’minū ‘that they may believe’; and similarly read either the second person plural or the third person plural in the next three instances in God and His Messenger and that you may support Him tu‘azzirūhu a variant reading has tu‘azzizūhu and revere Him the third person suffixed pronoun -hu ‘him’ may refer either to God or to His Messenger and glorify Him that is God morning and evening.
